name: ai-content-ideation-platform
description: Web application that generates blog post, video, and social media content ideas using AI

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently "cd backend && npm test" "cd frontend && npm test"

author: AI Web App Generator
